title: Text of a Letter to Certain Congressional Committees Regarding a Strategy to Counter Malign Foreign Influence Operations and Campaigns – The White House
content:
National Security & Defense	

Issued on:
October 23, 2019
October 23, 2019Dear Mr. Chairman:  (Dear Acting Chairwoman:)Consistent with section 1043(b) of the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2019 (Public Law 115-232), I transmit herewith a strategy to counter malign foreign influence operations and campaigns.Sincerely,DONALD J. TRUMP
